name: 2011-round-ethnic-group-population-projections
title: 2011 round ethnic group population projections
description:
Two projection variants were produced for the 2011 round: consistent with the published standard- and high- fertility population projections. These population projections incorporated development trajectories derived from the 2009 Strategic Housing Land Availability Assessment.

These projections have been produced on the basis of ten aggregated ethnic groups and were consistent with the available results from the 2001 Census.

resources.name: gla-egpp-2011rnd-shlaa-5yr-borough.xls
resources.description: Ethnic group population projections to 2031 for London boroughs by five-year age band. These projections are consistent with the 2011 round SHLAA-based population projections.

resources.name: gla-egpp-2011rnd-shlaa-highfertility-5yr-borough.xls
resources.description: Ethnic group population projections to 2031 for London boroughs by five-year age band. These projections are consistent with the 2011 round SHLAA-based high fertility population projections.
